summary: A medication list for Veteran A was sent home with Veteran B. Veteran A's name, full SSN, date of birth and medication information were compromised.  This is informational for Mis-Handling incidents and is the representative ticket. There were a total of 122 Mis-Handling incidents this reporting period. Because of repetition, the other 121 are not included in this report, but are included in the "Mis-Handling Incidents" count at the end of this report. In all incidents, Veterans will receive a notification letter and/or credit monitoring will be offered if appropriate.

victim.victim_id: United States Department of Veterans Affairs
